#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int k,n;
		
		scanf("%d",&n);
		scanf("%d",&k);
		char str[n+1];
		scanf("%s",str);
		
		char old=str[0];
		int count=1;
		bool poss=false;
		for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(old==str[i])
				count++;
			else
			{
				old=str[i];
				count=1;
			}
	//		cout<<count<<endl;
			if(count>=k)
			{
				poss=true;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(poss)
		{
			char old='\0';
			int ans=0,loc_counter=0;
			for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			{
				if(old!=str[i])
				{
					ans++;
					loc_counter=1;
					old=str[i];
				}
				else
				{
					loc_counter++;
					if(loc_counter>k)
					{
						loc_counter=1;
						ans++;
					}
				}
				
			}
			printf("%d\n",ans);
		}
		else
		{
			printf("-1\n");
		}
	}
}
